tools.title: Tabletop
tools.description: View and crop images from your webcam. Download the result.

tools.title: Masks
tools.description: Collage faces using your webcam.

tools.title: Grain
tools.description: Progressively pixelate an image.

tools.title: Conservation
tools.description: An experimental drawing app where the total RGB values are always preserved.

tools.title: CSS Paint
tools.description: Paint using brushes defined in CSS. An ode to the power of CSS and an experiment in giving people weird building blocks.

tools.title: Nest
tools.description: An experimental webpage-builder. Add content like a text document. Blocks can be nested to organize and structure. Use custom CSS and classes for layout and style.

tools.title: Grid
tools.description: An experimental text editor. Adjust the grid size and text direction to create weird and expressive layouts.

tools.title: Cascade
tools.description: An experiment in collaborative CSS. Style is determined by the most recent 32 posts.

tools.title: csOS
tools.description: Use the Constraint Systems collection of experimental creative tools all together in one place.

tools.title: Mosaic
tools.description: Recreate one image using the tiles from another image.

tools.title: Collage
tools.description: An experimental public collage that combines images according to their complexity.

tools.title: Type
tools.description: A directed typing experiment. You choose the direction the letters should flow.

tools.title: Push
tools.description: Push and pull blocks to distort an image.

tools.title: Flow
tools.description: An experimental image editor that lets you set and direct pixel-flows.

tools.title: Fracture
tools.description: Shatter and recombine images using a grid of viewports.

tools.title: Tri
tools.description: Tri is an experimental image distorter. You can choose an image to render using a WebGL quad, adjust the texture and position coordinates to create different distortions, and save the result.

tools.title: Tile
tools.description: Layout images using a tiling tree layout. Move, split, and resize images using keyboard controls.

tools.title: Sift
tools.description: Slice an image into multiple layers. You can offset the slices to create interference patterns and pseudo-3D effects.

tools.title: Automadraw
tools.description: Draw and evolve your drawing using cellular automata on a pixel grid with two keyboard-controlled cursors.

tools.title: Span
tools.description: Lay out and rearrange text, line by line, using keyboard controls.

tools.title: Stamp
tools.description: Image-paint from a source image palette using keyboard controls.

tools.title: Collapse
tools.description: Collapse an image into itself using ranked superpixels.

tools.title: Res
tools.description: Selectively pixelate an image using a compression algorithm.

tools.title: Rgb
tools.description: Pixel-paint using keyboard controls.

tools.title: Face
tools.description: Edit both the text and the font it is rendered in.

tools.title: Pal
tools.description: Apply an eight-color terminal color scheme to an image. Use the keyboard controls to choose a theme, set thresholds, and cycle hues.

tools.title: Bix
tools.description: Draw on binary to glitch text.

tools.title: Diptych
tools.description: Pixel-reflow an image to match the dimensions of your text. Save the result as a diptych.

tools.title: Slide
tools.description: Divide and slide-stretch an image using keyboard controls.

tools.title: Freeconfig
tools.description: Push around image pixels in blocks.

tools.title: Moire
tools.description: Generate angular skyscapes using Asteroids-like ship controls.

tools.title: Hex
tools.description: A keyboard-driven, grid-based drawing tool.

tools.title: Etch
tools.description: A keyboard-based pixel drawing tool.
